label: Behavior 41012102
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: navigating along a fixed route (the persistent alignment between COG and heading, combined with stable speed and negligible course deviation, indicates the vessel is following a straight, predefined maritime route; the position progression follows a linear trajectory moving west-southwest, approximated by the parametric equations: lat(t) ≈ 56.4508 + 0.0037 × t, lon(t) ≈ 11.7325 - 0.0095 × t, where t is a normalized time index from 0 to 1 over the observed segment)
